name: "Southern Delight" 4oz Cestari Superfine Merino
description:
Up for grabs, a skein of Southern Delight with an optional trim (in purple or green). This colorway consisted of bright red, purple, light green, caramel brown, warm yellow

Approximate oz/yards:
4 oz/210 yards

For more picture, please go to:
http://hyenacart.com/KnitNight/st/1881/64815/Southern-Delight-4oz-Cestari-Superfine-Merino-

Due to moving, I can no longer offer optional trim. 


If you are thinking of purchasing more than one, please let me know and I'll give you a quote. It could be more or less depending on the items and location.

Canada and International includes third party insurance.

name: "Freedom Rainbow" 8oz 3ply BBR Merino + 2oz trim
description:
Once in a while I need to dye something that is completely free form with too many colors to mention. I would like to categorize it as One of A Kind, although I wrote down the recipe. It consists some pinkish red due to the nature of kettle dye. 

Approximately 
4oz/250 yards each plus 2oz/125 yards trim
